name: Runtime (Allusio)
description:
Please note, Run Time is in early access, and needs your feedback!

Runtime is a first person platformer where you leap, grapple, and fall through each level, as fast as you can!

The game is broken up into 5 different chapters. Each chapter is its own world, and has its own unique asthetic. Each chapter has 10 levels for you to traverse.

Warning, Run Time is not easy, it is designed to be a challenge! However seeing as the game is in early access, feedback for difficulty is critical. 

We plan on regularly updating this build quite regulary, so we can get as much feedback as possible.

Content included in this build:

  • 6 levels - 3 from an island paradise, 3 from a lava filled world
  • Double Jump
  • Grappling Hook
  • Dash
  • Graphics options
  • Key rebinding

Please leave us some feedback on the community page, or comment below. At the end of the day, we are making this game for you!
